description: Make fragrant basil pesto pasta even greener with spinach and frozen peas. Sundried tomatoes add a pop of colour and flavour in this delicious pasta dish.
name: Pea Pesto & Sundried Tomato Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta according to packet instructions, adding 3/4 cup peas in the last 3 minutes of cooking. Drain. Return to pan.

Meanwhile, place remaining peas in a medium heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water. Stand for 3 minutes or until bright green and tender. Drain. Refresh under cold water. Place basil, peas, garlic, pine nuts, lemon juice, parmesan and half of the spinach in a food processor and process until finely chopped. Add oil and process until combined. Season.
Add pesto, tomato strips and remaining spinach to pasta mixture, then toss to combine. Serve.
